CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Prize-Winner - Mrs. Eunice Epps, 2506 Hallett Street received from Ralph Ellison, representative of Tumpson & Company, a Cameron Electric Portable Dishwasher as a third grand prize."
TitMainTitle: Tumpson and Company representative Ralph Ellison presenting portable dishwasher to Eunice Epps, during the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Ammon Center
